title: 6.20 Update is causing constant freezing and hard PC crashing in Win10
body:
I've tried repairing through the Hextech Repair Tool, even doing a complete Reinstall of the game and it continually locks up during game play. Sometimes it locks up so badly that mouse input is lagged to hell and the sound is all garbled. My PC becomes completely unresponsive during this time to the point that I have to power it off by hand.

This wasn't an issue until patch 6.20 came out. Any ideas on how to fix this, or should I play another game until Season 7?

replies.body: So are we going to pretend that the Xbox thing is the end-all be-all culprit of this random freezing even though that's not the case? I'm trying my hardest to enjoy this 10min Leaver buster for my next 5 games because of it. Call me a prick, but it's not very fun or fair considering it was a bot game that I managed to reconnect to, play the last 10mins to victory and game ended.... Help maybe?

ive had the same issue since last patch , its annoying , ive done all the Riot Support stuff still nothing ... it wont even run on my laptop and now it hard freezes my desktop, im hoping to find a solution soon

My work around has been to turn the graphics down to the lowest settings. Maybe it's a problem with some new particals or something. Riot is absolutely apathetic to the situation.

Yeah, this has been an ongoing problem with a recent Windows 10 update.  It auto enabled the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) which has been causing freezing issues for some players.  Disabling that should fix things up!

What if I told you I don't use the Xbox app at all in Windows 10 as I don't have an Xbox account? What if I told you that I went as far as to check the registry values listed in your link and one didn't even exist and the other was set to "off" already? Is there anything else causing this that you're aware of that I can look into?

The problem is that the update auto-enabled the Xbox Game Bar for a lot of players even if you didn't have an account.  If that didn't resolve the problem, then there could be other issues like drivers or even hardware.  In this case, I'd recommend checking out our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to rule out those possibilities.  Hopefully, that will get your specific issue fixed up!
